tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (CD 3) (NNS days)) (VP (VBD left) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NN office))) (NP-TMP (DT this) (NN year))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [left/VBD nsubj>[days/NNS nummod>3/CD] nmod:in>[office/NN case>in/IN det>the/DT] nmod:tmod>[year/NN det>this/DT] punct>./.]
